LanguageData.Cults_PsionicBlast.label: Psionic Blast
LanguageData.Cults_PsionicShock.label: Psionic Shock
LanguageData.Cults_PsionicShock.description: Paralyzes the brain of the target. On a critical success, the shock causes the head of the target to explode.
LanguageData.Cults_PsionicBurn.label: Psionic Burn
LanguageData.Cults_PsionicBurn.description: Starts a fire on the target.
